title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 102.8 - Renewal or extension of certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 102.8 - Renewal or extension of certificate

State Regulations

No renewal or extension may be granted for more than one
year, but successive annual renewals or extensions may be granted. However, no
such annual renewal or extension shall extend beyond the ninth year after that
to which the original certificate relates. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
102.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
